#+TITLE: French Verb Drill: Technical Processes
#+AUTHOR: Generated by verbiste.el
#+STARTUP: overview

* Introduction

This drill focuses on verbs related to technical or industrial processes.
Practice conjugating these verbs in different tenses and using them in sentences.

* Verbs in this group

1. niveler
2. laminer
3. ioniser
4. contrôler
5. rééquilibrer
6. calibrer
7. programmer
8. automatiser
9. numériser
10. standardiser

* Example Sentences

- Nous nivelons le terrain. (We level the ground.)
- Cette machine lamine le métal. (This machine rolls the metal.)
- Le processus ionise les particules. (The process ionizes the particles.)

* Conjugation Drills

** niveler

*** Present Tense

| Subject   | Conjugation |
|-----------+------------|
| je | |
| tu | |
| il/elle | |
| nous | |
| vous | |
| ils/elles | |

| Subject   | Conjugation |
|-----------+------------|
| je | |
| tu | |
| il/elle | |
| nous | |
| vous | |
| ils/elles | |

| Subject   | Conjugation |
|-----------+------------|
| je | |
| tu | |
| il/elle | |
